post.body: I have too, but that's cuz I have allergies & asthma & can only wear one kind w/o problems. www.christinebean.com
Thats cool! I can do a mean Milli Vanilli.
I know now....I posted a reply....smiling....
Not today, but did the other day
GREAT quote! Thanks for sharing it!
I ditto that!
No surprise, an email I sent a friend on FB got rejected as "offensive" when I was telling her about a new social network.
Watching mean kitty...reminds me of my kitty Keesha...http://tinyurl.com/7kfc73
Thinking it's always nice to ave a visit from friends & relatives, especially the A & B's from Sheldon/Boise!
Merry Christmas my tweets! May it be a joyful one! Blessings, Christine, www.christinebean.com
Taking J.K. Zuber’s Home for the Holidays survey thru Freedom Communications in Irvine, CA. Feels like old home week…:)
A shout out 2 the Cordell's at Dad’s Divorce & TX Youth 4 the visits about Lohstroh. Been about 4 years, huh? Thanks, www.christinebean.com
Thinking it’s a small world! My former roomie knows someone I’ve known for over 30 years! It’s the old 6dgr of Bacon again!
Rumor has it that Facebook will be charging a fee starting in 2009. Anyone else hear that? Guess there is always www.zzbeanteam.com
Having fun getting organized and consolidating! ....now off to bed. Night tweets. Blessings, Christine, www.christinebean.com
Reminiscing after hearing from the Buffington's in London about the Buffington's in TX....;)
Giving a "thank you" shout out to the recent website visitors! Nice to see some familiar faces. It's been a LONG time! Blessings, Christine
Tweets & Entrecard droppers...www.christinebean.com,www.yourownmindmovie.com,www.zzbeanteam.com are at 8ec to advertise!
The Vision Board works – lost 8# and 5-1/2”in 5 wks! I’m ½ way to my goal! Blessings,Christine,www.christinebean.com
Celebrating! I's late/early, www.beanstalkline.com is BACK!?!?! Blessings, Christine Bean, www.christinebean.com yes, Bean is my last name!
